title: Video of PM Modi Asking Child to Say ‘Rahul Pappu Hai’ Is Fake
subtitle: Fake News: A video of Prime Minister Narendra Modi guiding a young child to a podium and allegedly making her say “Rahul Gandhi pappu hai” is circulating online. It is a doctored video.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video of Prime Minister Narendra Modi guiding a young child to a podium and purportedly encouraging her say “Rahul Gandhi pappu hai” is being circulated on Facebook.

The posts claim that the prime minister has "crossed all boundaries” by making the child say the phrase.
